content.question: Let f be the function defined by <math> <mrow> <mi> f </mi> <mrow> <mo> ( </mo> <mi> x </mi> <mo> ) </mo> </mrow> <mo> = </mo> <mfrac> <mn> 1 </mn> <mi> x </mi> </mfrac> </mrow> </math> .What is the average value of f on the interval [4, 6] ?

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
